rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
Wayfarer [i](If you’ve spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} this turn, discover L’Or.)[/i]
Watchful Ashwing has ward {4} as long as you’ve discovered L’Or.
notes:
WU:
 - five or more artifacts
 - metalcraft
UB:
 - even MV only
 - Zombies
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
UR:
 - all fliers
 - drakes/dragons
